content.question: The “unstable equilibrium” referred to by Bismarck in the first paragraph is best explained by which of the following developments in European politics?

choices.label: The effective withdrawal of Great Britain from engagement in conflicts on the European continent
The creation of the Dual Monarchy recognizing Hungary’s status within the Austro-Hungarian Empire
The unification of the German Empire under Prussian leadership
The rise of new political parties favoring socialist policies and workers’ rights

content.answer: The unification of the German Empire under Prussian leadership

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
